adm:managed-object.name: plugin-root
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis:
The
defines the parent entry for all plugins defined in the server. It may also include configuration attributes that define the order in which those plugins should be loaded and invoked.

adm:property.name: plugin-order-startup
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the order in which startup plugins should be loaded and invoked. The value should be a comma-delimited list of plugin names (where the plugin name is the RDN value from the plugin configuration entry DN). The list may include at most one asterisk to indicate the position of any unnamed plugin (and the relative order of those unnamed plugins will be undefined).

adm:alias.adm:synopsis: The order in which startup plugins are loaded and invoked will be undefined.

adm:property.name: plugin-order-shutdown
adm:property.adm:synopsis: Specifies the order in which shutdown plugins should be loaded and invoked. The list may include at most one asterisk to indicate the position of any unnamed plugin (and the relative order of those unnamed plugins will be undefined).
